text: Keenen Ivory Desuma Wayans (born June 8, 1958) is an American actor, comedian, and filmmaker. He first became known as the host and the creator of the 1990â€“1994 Fox sketch comedy series In Living Color. He directed Scary Movie (2000). From 1997 to 1998, he hosted the talk show The Keenen Ivory Wayans Show.
